overview: Vincent, married with two children, runs a wholesale and semi-wholesale business in Rungis. He's earthbound, bloodthirsty, instinctive, gruff, manual. He adores his wife... But also his mistress to whom he pays a weekly and regular visit from Monday 3 p.m. to Wednesday 3 p.m. Christian, too, is married and has two children. He is a lecturer in philosophy at the Sorbonne. He is gentle, calm, collected. He is an intellectual. He adores his wife... And even more his mistress whom he maintains and whom he visits from Wednesday 3 p.m. to Friday 3 p.m. And there is Patricia, their only common point, a woman who changes her personality according to her lovers. She is a very organized woman. Until the day when... Love, sex, marriage, fidelity, lies, alliances, friendship, enmity, betrayal, cowardice!
title: Part-Time Lovers
